DOC.brief_title: Mindful Positive Reappraisal : Daily Diary Randomized Controlled Trial
DOC.detailed_description: The University student lifestyle lead heighten stress , anxiety , burnout . To promote mental health , brief cost-effective intervention teach beneficial emotion regulation technique counteract negative also foster positive functioning . The tool mindfulness ( i.e. , objective awareness acceptance ) positive reappraisal ( i.e. , positive re-evaluation negative event ) mutually benefit one another promote well-being . However , currently little research test viability brief , self-administered intervention combine training mindfulness positive reappraisal . The current study explore effect randomly-assigned Mindful-Reappraisal intervention ( n=36 ) compare Reappraisal-Only ( n=34 ) active control ( n=36 ) university student ' daily affect five day . Time condition interaction analyze planned contrast multilevel growth modelling .
